questList.questDescription: Navigate the dark-grass meadows and choose to either strike down or ally with the Spectral Wraith, known as Spectral Wraith.
Forge an alliance with the Ethereal Revenant, also referred to as Ethereal Revenant, in the midst of the shadows' domain.
Eliminate the Legendary Dread Lich, known as Dread Lich, to claim the amulet of alliance and safeguard your path forward.
Traverse the rusty-chain platforms and decide the fate of the Dustborn Guardian, the Dustborn Guardian.
Embrace the alliance with the Spectral Phantom, also known as Spectral Phantom, amidst the decaying ruins.
Defeat the Legendary Rotting Pharaoh, called Rotting Pharaoh, to earn the amulet of alliance and progress further.
Face the Ethereal Spirit Warrior, the Spectralblade, in a decisive battle to claim victory and bring light to the spectral citadel.
Unite with the Flameguardian, also known as Flameguardian, amidst the fiery fractured-wall platforms to receive the amulet of healing.
Slay the Formidable Blazeheart, known as Blazeheart, to obtain the amulet of alliance and pave your way forward.
